hero.subtitle: The Cookie Apocalypse is coming in Q1 2026. Chrome and Safari are blocking 90% of tracking. AdsEngineer preserves your attribution data across any platform‚Äîfrom GoHighLevel to Shopify and beyond.

list.desc: Whether you use GHL webhooks, Shopify, or a custom CMS, we receive lead data the moment it's submitted and bridge it back to your ad platforms.
